scripts.gs: npm run generate && npm run faker
scripts.cy:run: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:4200 "cypress run --browser chrome --headless --config video=false,screenshotOnRunFailure=false --record --key 0c154c63-3213-42a7-af73-2fed43ef7fe8"
scripts.cy:run:fast: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:4200 "cypress run --browser chrome --headless --config video=false,screenshotOnRunFailure=false --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/*.spec.cy.ts'"
scripts.cy:run:critical: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:4200 "cypress run --browser chrome --headless --config video=false,screenshotOnRunFailure=false --spec 'cypress/e2e/permits/new-permit-page/*.spec.cy.ts,cypress/e2e/permits/update-permit-page/*.spec.cy.ts'"
scripts.cy:run:smoke: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:4200 "cypress run --browser chrome --headless --config video=false,screenshotOnRunFailure=false --spec 'cypress/e2e/permits/all-permits-page/permit-crud.spec.cy.ts'"
scripts.cy:parallel:safe: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:4200 "cypress run --browser chrome --headless --parallel --config video=false,screenshotOnRunFailure=false --spec 'cypress/e2e/permits/new-permit-page/new-permit-validation-behavior.spec.cy.ts,cypress/e2e/permits/update-permit-page/update-permit-form-validation.spec.cy.ts,cypress/e2e/permits/performance/fast-validation-tests.spec.cy.ts'"
scripts.cy:headless: mkdir -p cypress/logs cypress/reports && cypress run --headless --record --key 0c154c63-3213-42a7-af73-2fed43ef7fe8 --reporter json --reporter-options 'output=cypress/reports/results.json' 2>&1 | tee "cypress/logs/console-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).log"
scripts.cy:ci: start-server-and-test start http://localhost:4200 "cypress run --browser chrome --headless --reporter spec --record false"
scripts.test:all: npm run karma && npm run cy:test
